reviewText: Great relaxation or sleep inducing video, or nice for anyone who just wants to recall winter camping ;)  Another review commented video is not as wanted, but I can't quite see the problem, as it is not only exactly as described, but exactly as shown in the cover picture.  The DVD runs a bit over an hour but auto-loops after that which really does make the peaceful fire flicker "endlessly" in a rock-lined pit dug in the snow.  The audio track is simply the fire crackling and the sound of the breeze; there is no music here.
not worth time too un wrap it, does not make a a good frizbee.. they shoud be sued over this dvd
